mapper.select:
select t.* from(
SELECT t.*, t2.username tousername, t3.username createusername, t4.name orgname FROM cms_work_goal t left join sys_user t2 on t.touser=t2.usercode left join sys_user t3 on t.createuser=t3.usercode left join sys_org t4 on t4.id=t3.orgid where 1=1
and (t.touser=#{touser} or t.createuser=#{touser})
and t2.username like '%' || #{username} || '%'
and t.goalname like '%' || #{goalname} || '%'
and t.goalno like '%' || #{goalno} || '%'
AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend}
and t.isfinish=#{isfinish}
and FIND_IN_SET(t.touser,(select GROUP_CONCAT(usercode) from sys_user t where FIND_IN_SET(t.orgid,queryChildOrg(${orgid}))))
order by t.goalno desc,t.id desc)t

SELECT count(*)counter FROM cms_work_goal t left join sys_user t2 on t.touser=t2.usercode left join sys_user t3 on t.createuser=t3.usercode left join sys_org t4 on t4.id=t3.orgid where 1=1
and (t.touser=#{touser} or t.createuser=#{touser})
and t2.username like '%' || #{username} || '%'
and t.goalname like '%' || #{goalname} || '%'
and t.goalno like '%' || #{goalno} || '%'
AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend}
and t.isfinish=#{isfinish}
and t2.id in (select id from sys_user t where FIND_IN_SET(t.orgid,queryChildOrg(${orgid})) )

select t.* from( SELECT t.*, t2.username tousername, t3.username createusername, t4.name orgname FROM cms_work_goal t left join sys_user t2 on t.touser=t2.usercode left join sys_user t3 on t.createuser=t3.usercode left join sys_org t4 on t4.id=t3.orgid where 1=1 and t.goalno=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
and t.touser in (select usercode from sys_user t where FIND_IN_SET(t.orgid,queryChildOrg(${orgid})) )
order by t.PRIORITY )t limit 5
select * from ( select t2.username,t.* from cms_log t left join sys_user t2 on t.createuser=t2.usercode where t.objid=#{id} and t.objtype='workgoal' order by t.id desc)t limit 20

select 'goal' worktype,count(*)counter from cms_work_goal t where t.touser=#{touser} and t.isfinish='0' union all select 'work' ,count(*) from cms_work t where t.touser=#{touser} and t.isfinish='0' union all select 'problem' ,count(*) from cms_problem t where t.touser=#{touser} and t.isfinish='0' union all select 'bug' ,count(*) from cms_work_bug t where t.touser=#{touser} and t.isfinish='0'
